title: IAG sees quarterly profits soar
text:
Aviation Marketing Account Manager – Manchester Airport 
Manchester Airport Group | Manchester | Competitive 
M.A.G keep 42 million passengers on the move from four of the UK's leading airports -Manchester, London Stansted, East Midlands, and Bournemouth. At Manchester Airport we keep 22 million passengers on the move to over 200 global destinations every year. Imagine being part of our fast growing airport with over 19,000 colleagues on site, and enormously exciting projects like the landmark £800m Airport City development in the pipeline. Imagine being responsible for the kind of tactical and strategic sales and marketing plans that keep an inspirational and high-achieving business like ours in the air.
